messages.message: I’m re-running tests now, but it was an issue yesterday https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/60800
cypress ci is failing due to the test accounts not being commercial accounts, so features are disabled. @Xindi Xu have there been changes related to the setup here?
I haven't changed anything recently. I'll take a look
OK, looks like we failed to create cypress orgs. Probably because the OAuth token is no longer valid
I'll put up a PR to update the oauth token
hm, looks like the oauth token is still valid. It has to to with the create org endpoint only.

https://crafting-cyp.test.instabase.com/grafana/d/liz0yRCZz/logs-dashboard-quick-search?orgI[…]re-platform-service&var-search=org&from=now-5m&to=now (https://crafting-cyp.test.instabase.com/grafana/d/liz0yRCZz/logs-dashboard-quick-search?orgId=1&var-datasource=loki&var-label_name=tenant_id&var-label_value=&var-service=All&var-container=api-server&var-container=core-platform-service&var-search=org&from=now-5m&to=now)
I'll ask core-services team on this. The endpoint to create org is not functioning correctly

Matt and I looked into this in crafting-cyp env. Some logs seem to be missing so we didn't narrow down the cause.
I'm trying to reproduce this locally but got a unrelated file system issue https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C06FA6A23/p1722918281798349?thread_ts=1722287077.707969&cid=C06FA6A23
OK, i can reproduce it locally and I have an idea on the backend fix
@Xindi Xu have you reached out directly to get a review on this PR? If it’s blocking cypress tests it’d be good to get it merged in sooner than later.
waiting for CI to pass now
This is merged and I kicked off a new deployment
ok my tests are fixed, thanks @Xindi Xu!
Good to know! Appreciate your patience
